document_data.mainbody:
il was a sirine matriarch that lived on the Sword Coast during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Unlike other sirines that were often high-spirited and exuberant, Sil was rather defensive and ready to defend her tribes home at the slightest provocation.
She could make herself invisible and had the power to make others go into a furious rage and attempt to slay anyone nearby.
Sil led a small tribe of sirines that included at least two others of her kind.
In the , Sil and her tribe relocated to a beach on the Sword Coast just north of the Seawatcher lighthouse, claiming it as their "living-land". As they claimed the territory the sirines managed to sink the boat of a local fisherman.
